document.full_text: an armed man who forced the lockdown of a college campus was captured by police near rolla, missouri, on thursday following a chase that began at an army base and involved gunfire but no injuries, authorities said.
document.title: gunman captured after missouri shooting spree
lines_and_colors: an armed man who forced the lockdown of a college campus was captured by police near rolla, missouri, on thursday following a chase that began at an army base and involved gunfire but no injuries, authorities said.
